lightningTeleportation.name: Lightning & Teleportation
lightningTeleportation.desc: Harness the power of storms and electricity, and bend space to your will.

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.desc:
Destruction (Cantrip) Cost: 1 AP | Range: 10 Spaces | Duration: Instantaneous

Effects:
- Spell Attack: Make a Spell Check against the PD of a target within range. Hit: The target takes 2 Lightning damage.
- Lightning Orb: Create crackling lightning between your hands for up to 10 minutes, shedding Bright Light in a 10 Space radius. The energy is harmless to you and your equipment. The Spell ends early if you: Dismiss it (no cost), Cast it again, Stop using both hands, or Spend 1 AP to make a Spell Attack with it.
- Cantrip Passive: Deal +1 damage to creatures wearing metal armor.

Action Point Enhancements:
- Damage (1 AP): +1 Lightning damage.
- Range (1 AP): Increase range by +5 Spaces.
- Chain (1 AP): Target 1 additional creature within 2 Spaces of the previous target. Make a separate Spell Check against the new target. Hit: The additional target takes 2 Lightning damage (not affected by extra damage sources like Heavy Hits or higher-level effects). This Enhancement can be used multiple times, chaining to additional targets within 2 Spaces of the previous one.
spells.descSummary: 2 Lightning dmg vs PD OR create light orb. Cantrip: +1 dmg vs metal armor. Enhance: +dmg, +range, chain targets.

spells.name: Crackling Lightning
spells.desc:
Destruction Cost: 2 AP + 1 MP | Range: Self (10 Spaces) | Duration: Instantaneous

Crackling lightning forms around you. Choose a type of area: Line, Cone, or Sphere. You are the Spell's Point of Origin.
- Line: Affects every target in a 1 Space wide and 10 Space long area.
- Cone: Affects every target in a 3 Space long Cone.
- Sphere: Affects every target within a 2 Space radius.

Make a Spell Check against each target's PD within the area.
- Hit: Targets take 2 Lightning damage.

Mana Point Enhancements:
- Frazzled (1 MP): Targets must Save against the Dazed Condition for 1 minute.
- Range (1 MP): Change the Spell's origin point to 15 Spaces (instead of Self).
spells.descSummary: 2 Lightning dmg in Line/Cone/Sphere vs PD. Enhance: Dazed save, remote origin.

spells.name: Misty Step
spells.desc:
Astromancy Cost: 1 AP + 1 MP | Range: Self | Duration: Instantaneous

Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you attempt to teleport to a new location.

Make a DC 20 Spell Check.
- Success: Teleport up to 5 Spaces to an unoccupied space you can see. For every 5 points above the DC, increase the teleport distance by +2 Spaces.
- Failure: Teleport 3 Spaces instead.

Mana Point Enhancements:
- Far Step (1 MP): Increase the teleport distance by +4 Spaces.
spells.descSummary: DC 20: Teleport 5 spaces (or 3 on fail). +2 spaces per 5 over DC. Enhance: +4 spaces.

psychicEnchantment.name: Psychic & Enchantment
psychicEnchantment.desc: Manipulate minds and bend reality with mental power.

spells.name: Psi Bolt
spells.desc:
Destruction (Cantrip) Cost: 1 AP | Range: 10 Spaces | Duration: Instantaneous

Effects:
- Spell Attack: Make a Spell Check against the MD of a target within range. Hit: The target takes 1 Psychic damage.
- Headache: Cause a mild headache in one creature you can see within range for 1 minute, or spend 1 AP to make a Spell Attack.

Cantrip Passive:
- Deal +1 damage to creatures that are Dazed.

Action Point Enhancements:
- Damage (1 AP): +1 Psychic damage.
- Range (1 AP): Increase range by +5 Spaces.
- Dazed (1 AP): Target makes a Mental Save. Failure: The target becomes Dazed (DisADV on Mental Checks) on its next Mental Check before the end of your next turn.
spells.descSummary: 1 Psychic dmg vs MD OR cause headache. Cantrip: +1 dmg vs Dazed. Enhance: +dmg, +range, Dazed save.

spells.name: Psychic Fear
spells.desc:
Enchantment Cost: 2 AP + 1 MP | Range: 10 Spaces | Duration: Instantaneous

Whisper a discordant melody to one creature you can see within range, causing it terrible pain.

Make a Spell Check against the target's MD while it makes an Intelligence Save.
- Hit: The target takes 2 Psychic damage.
- Save Failure: If the target has any AP, it spends 1 AP to move as far as its Speed allows away from you. The creature avoids obviously dangerous ground (e.g., fire or pits).

Mana Point Enhancements:
- Loud Whispers (1 MP): The creature loses an additional 1 AP (if available) and moves that many extra Spaces away.
spells.descSummary: 2 Psychic dmg vs MD + INT save: spend 1 AP to flee. Enhance: lose extra AP, move farther.

spells.name: Command
spells.desc:
Enchantment Cost: 2 AP + 1 MP | Range: 10 Spaces | Duration: 1 Round

Speak a command to a creature within range that can hear you. The creature doesn't need to be visible to you if you've seen it within the last minute.

Make a Spell Check contested by the target's Charisma Save.
- Success: The target immediately spends 2 AP to follow your command, regardless of the usual AP cost. The creature also cannot spend any resources (AP, SP, MP) to modify the action.

Ignoring a Command: The spell has no effect if the target doesn't understand your language, is unable to follow the command, or would be harmed directly by following the command.

Choosing a Command: You can choose from the following example commands or improvise with GM approval:
- Move: The target moves up to its Speed to a location or direction of your choice.
- Prone: The target falls Prone.
- Drop: The target drops anything it's holding.
- Attack: The target makes 1 Attack Check or Spell Check (your choice) that costs 1 AP. You choose the target, which must be within the creature's range.

Mana Point Enhancements:
- Duration (1 MP): Increase the duration by 1 Round.
- Targets (2 MP): Add 1 additional target.
spells.descSummary: CHA save: target spends 2 AP to obey command (Move/Prone/Drop/Attack). Enhance: +duration, +targets.

holyRestoration.name: Holy & Restoration
holyRestoration.desc: Channel divine light to heal allies and smite foes.

spells.name: Sacred Bolt
spells.desc:
Destruction (Cantrip) Cost: 1 AP | Range: 10 Spaces | Duration: Instantaneous

Effects:
- Spell Attack: Make a Spell Check against the MD of a target within range. Hit: The target takes 1 Radiant damage.
- Bright Beam: Cause a subtle light to descend upon a creature you can see within range, making it glow for 10 minutes or make a Spell Attack.

Cantrip Passive:
- Deal +1 Radiant damage to Undead and Exposed creatures.

Action Point Enhancements:
- Damage (1 AP): +1 Radiant damage.
- Range (1 AP): Increase the range by +5 Spaces.
- Holy Bolt (1 AP): The target makes a Mental Save. Failure: The target becomes Exposed (Attack Checks against it have ADV) until the end of your next turn or until the next Attack Check made against it.
spells.descSummary: 1 Radiant dmg vs MD OR glow target. Cantrip: +1 vs Undead/Exposed. Enhance: +dmg, +range, Exposed save.

spells.name: Bless
spells.desc:
Divination Cost: 2 AP + 1 MP | Range: 5 Spaces | Duration: 1 minute (Concentration)

Make a DC 10 Spell Check.
- Success: Bless up to 3 creatures of your choice within range. For every 10 points above the DC, bless +1 additional creature.
- Failure: Bless only 2 creatures.

Effect: While the spell lasts, whenever a blessed target makes a Check or Save, it can roll a d4 and add the result to the total.

Mana Point Enhancements:
- Targets (1 MP): Increase the number of targets by +1.
- Grace (2 MP): Change the die rolled from a d4 to a d6.
spells.descSummary: DC 10: Bless 3 targets (or 2 on fail). Add d4 to checks/saves (1 min, conc). Enhance: +targets, d4â†’d6.

spells.name: Heal
spells.desc:
Restoration Cost: 2 AP + 1 MP | Range: 10 Spaces | Duration: Instantaneous

Make a DC 10 Spell Check.
- Success: Heal a creature within range for 3 HP. For every 5 points above the DC, heal an additional +1 HP. On a Nat 20, heal an additional +2 HP.
- Failure: Heal for only 2 HP.

Additional Effect: If touching the target when you cast this spell, it heals for an additional 1 HP.

Mana Point Enhancements:
- Quick Heal (1 MP): Reduce the AP cost by 1 AP.
- Bolster: Spend 1 MP to increase healing by +3 HP for each MP spent.
spells.descSummary: DC 10: Heal 3 HP (or 2 on fail). +1 HP per 5 over DC, +2 on Nat 20, +1 if touch. Enhance: -1 AP, +3 HP per MP.
